artist: Engraver: A.B. Duhamel; Artist: after Jean-Florentine Defraine; Author: Jean-Antoine Lebrun-Tossa; Publisher: François Buisson

creditline:
The Minnich Collection

description: Fashion periodical with a trifold hand-colored engraving of a candelabra on the left; two women in the center shown from the waist up in elaborate hats; on the right a woman in a blue and white gown with pink trim, pink fan, pink sash around her waist, and a green hat with pink flowers
portfolio: From Magasin des Modes nouvelles, françaises et anglaises, Paris, 1786-89
title: Magasin des Modes Nouvelles, Troisième Année, Vingt-septième Cahier, 10 Août 1788
